ROOT.SelectCondition: select {0} from {1} where 1=1 and exists(select 1 from {2} where 1=1 {3}) order by {4}
ROOT.PriorSelect: select {0} from {1} start with {0}={2} connect by prior {0}={3}
ROOT.LatitudeAndLongitude:
select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B where id={0}--变电站 union select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B where id={0}--发电厂 union select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B where id={0}--换流站 union select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B where id={0}--直流接地极站
ROOT.GetDeptInfo:
select id,LEVEL,name_abbreviation,parent_id from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B where LEVEL in ('1002','1003','1004','1005') order by LEVEL,parent_id,name_abbreviation
ROOT.GetDeptInfo_bak:
select id,LEVEL,name_abbreviation,parent_id from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B where LEVEL in ('1002','1003','1004','1005') order by LEVEL,parent_id,name_abbreviation
ROOT.GetDeptLocation:
/*select id,name,longitude,latitude from dbcitylocation order by name*/ select '' as id,'' as name,'' as longitude,'' as latitude FROM
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B WHERE 1=0
ROOT.GetTZJL: select j.accidentid,j.happentime,'天津',v.voltagedesc,p.deptdesc,d.devicename,'' bhtzqk,'' clwcsj,'' fshfsj from monitorsignal.tjumpmsg j left join psgraph_data_tj.tdevice d on j.devicename=d.devicename left join psgraph_data_tj.tdepartment p on d.ownerdepartidx=p.departidx left join psgraph_data_tj.tvoltage v on p.voltageidx=v.voltageidx where j.happentime>={0} and j.happentime<{1} order by v.voltagevalue desc,j.happentime
ROOT.GetTZDetail: select signal_time,signal_name||' '||signal_type from monitorsignal.tbsignalbasis_{{0}} where ownerevent={1} and reason_id=3 order by signal_time
ROOT.GetXjtId: select * from psgraph_gw.tgraphics where graphicname like '%{0}%'
ROOT.GetStationInfo:
select '变电站' from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B where id={0} UNION select '换流站' from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B where id={0}
ROOT.GetLineInfo:
select '直流线路' from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B where id={0} UNION select '交流线路' from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B where id={0}
ROOT.GetYunDeviceInfo: select id from {{0}} where name like '%{1}%' and st_id={2}
ROOT.GetSerchStationInfo:
select name,top_ac_voltage_type,OPERATE_STATE,ID from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B where pg_id in ( select ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B start with ID={0} connect by prior ID=PARENT_ID ) and top_ac_voltage_type in (1001,1002,1003,1004,1005) order by id
ROOT.GetSerchDcststemInfo:
select name,VOLTAGE_TYPE,RUNNING_STATE,ID from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B where GRID_ID in ( select ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B start with ID={0} connect by prior ID=PARENT_ID )
ROOT.GetSerchFactoryInfo:
select name,MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE,OPERATE_STATE,ID from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B where CONNECTIVE_PG_ID in ( select ID from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B start with ID={0} connect by prior ID=PARENT_ID )
ROOT.GetOverWeightLine:
select ac.v00 vol,acb.name line_name,sta1.name start_sta,sta2.name end_sta from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_H1_MEA_2018 ac join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B acb ON acb.ID= ac.ID and acb.voltage_type=1002 join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B sta1 ON sta1.id=acb.start_st_id join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B sta2 ON sta2.id=acb.end_st_id Where Meas_type=2001 and create_time='2018-01-02 08:00:00'
ROOT.GetUserDept1:
SELECT id,NAME_ABBREVIATION,dtype FROM ( select d.id,d.NAME_ABBREVIATION, 2 as dtype from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_EMPLOYEE_B u join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B d on u.dept_id=d.id where u.id={0} union all select LOCATION_GRID,'',1 from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_SYS_UA_USER_B WHERE user_employee_id={0} ) ORDER BY dtype
ROOT.GetUserDept2:
select p.id,p.NAME_ABBREVIATION from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_EMPLOYEE_B u join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCCDEPT_B d on u.dept_id=d.id join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B p on d.org_id=p.id where u.id={0}
ROOT.GetSubstationLocationByType: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,v.name,{0},s.id,s.name,s.OPERATE_DATE,v.code,s.DCC_ID,s.PG_ID,s.OPERATE_STATE,s.OWNER from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where type={0}
ROOT.GetPlantLocationByType: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,v.name,{0},s.id,s.name,s.OPERATE_DATE,v.code,s.DCC_ID,s.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID,s.OPERATE_STATE,s.OWNER from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where PLANT_TYPE={0}
ROOT.GetConverLocation: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,v.name,3001,s.id,s.name,s.OPERATE_DATE,v.code,s.DCC_ID,S.PG_ID,s.OPERATE_STATE,s.OWNER from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code
ROOT.GetHvdcgroundLocation: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,v.name,3002,s.id,s.name,s.OPERATE_DATE,v.code,s.DCC_ID,h.PG_ID,s.OPERATE_STATE,s.OWNER from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSYS_B d ON s.HVDCGROUNDSYS_ID=d.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCSYS_B h ON d.HVDC_SYS_ID=h.ID
ROOT.GetOtherSubstationLocation: select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,v.name,type,s.id,s.name,s.OPERATE_DATE,v.code,s.DCC_ID,s.PG_ID,s.OPERATE_STATE,s.OWNER from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v ON s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where type between 2005 and 2006
ROOT.GetLocationInfoBase:
select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B where {0} union select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B where {0} union select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B where {0} union select LONGITUDE,LATITUDE,VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B where {0}
ROOT.GetPlantStationVoltage:
SELECT code,name FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE where CODE IN ( SELECT TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B UNION select MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B union select DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B union select VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B ) and name!='0.4kV'
ROOT.GetVoltageByPlantStationType:
SELECT TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE from
same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B WHERE TYPE IN ({0}) UNION select MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B WHERE PLANT_TYPE IN ({0}) union select DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B WHERE TYPE IN ({0}) union select VOLTAGE_TYPE from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_HVDCGROUNDSTATION_B WHERE 3002 IN ({0})
ROOT.GetStateList: select 0 idx, case code when 1003 then 1 when 1002 then 2 when 1004 then 9999 else code end ord, code,name from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_stationstate where name!='作废' UNION ALL select 1 idx, case code when 1003 then 1 when 1002 then 2 when 1005 then 9997 when 1006 then 9998 when 1007 then 9999 else code end ord, code,name from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dic_state where name!='报废' and name!='作废' order by idx,ord
ROOT.SetShowTowerOn: update datacenter.voltage_config set "showTowerCount"=30 where code in (1001,2001,2002)
ROOT.GetStationLocation: SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN ({{0}}) UNION SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN ({{0}}) UNION SELECT s.ID,s.LATITUDE,s.LONGITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN ({{0}})
ROOT.GetLineLocation: SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where id={0} UNION SELECT l.ID,v.NAME AS VOLNAME,l.DISPATCH_ORG_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B l join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on l.VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code where id={0}
ROOT.GetStationPosition: SELECT s.ID,s.LONGITUDE,s.LATITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN ({{0}}) UNION SELECT s.ID,s.LONGITUDE,s.LATITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.plant_type as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN ({{0}}) UNION SELECT s.ID,s.LONGITUDE,s.LATITUDE,s.NAME,v.NAME VOLNAME,s.TYPE as PLANTSTATIONTYPE,s.DCC_ID FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B s join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE v on s.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=v.code WHERE ID IN ({{0}})
ROOT.GetLinePosition: select l.id,s1.longitude,s1.latitude,s2.longitude,s2.latitude ,(select t.longitude||'_'||t.latitude from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_r_tower r on t.id=r.tower_id where r.line_id=l.id and t.towerno=(select cast(count(*)/30*15 as varchar) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_R_TOWER where line_id=l.id)) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_acline_b l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_substation_b s1 on l.start_st_id=s1.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_substation_b s2 on l.end_st_id=s2.id where l.id in ({{0}}) UNION ALL select l.id,s1.longitude,s1.latitude,s2.longitude,s2.latitude ,(select t.longitude||'_'||t.latitude from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_tower_b t join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_r_tower r on t.id=r.tower_id where r.line_id=l.id and t.towerno=(select cast(count(*)/30*15 as varchar) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_R_TOWER where line_id=l.id)) from same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_dev_dcline_b l left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_substation_b s1 on l.start_st_id=s1.id left join same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName sg_con_substation_b s2 on l.end_st_id=s2.id where l.id in ({{0}})

GetSettings.Dump: 区外电网、线路粗细、电网模式、厂站名称、线路名称、鼠标停留提示、闪烁时间

Data.GetMapSettings: select a.configname,ISNULL(u.value,a.value) as value from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName YSH_MAP_CONFIG a LEFT JOIN same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName YSH_MAP_CONFIG_USER u ON a.configname=u.configname and u.userid='{0}'

Data1.GetLineSettings: SELECT 'linewidth',max(linewidth) FROM same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName voltage_config where show=1
Data1.GetTowerSettings: select 'directlink',1-MAX("showTowerCount")/30 from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName voltage_config where show=1
Data1.GetVoltageSettings: select code,name,"showTowerCount",linewidth from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName voltage_config where show=1

SaveSettings_1.directlink0: update same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName voltage_config set "showTowerCount"=30 where code in (1001,2001,2002)
SaveSettings_1.linewidth: UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName voltage_config SET linewidth={0} WHERE show=1
SaveSettings_1.mapType: UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName YSH_MAP_CONFIG SET value={0} WHERE configname='mapType'
SaveSettings_1.shortName: UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName YSH_MAP_CONFIG SET value={0} WHERE configname='shortName'
SaveSettings_1.glowSecond: UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName YSH_MAP_CONFIG SET value={0} WHERE configname='glowSecond'
SaveSettings_1.showTip: UPDATE same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaName YSH_MAP_CONFIG SET value={0} WHERE configname='showTip'

ROOT.GetSceneList: select ID,NAME,GROUPNAME from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_SCENE_INFO WHERE USERID='{0}' ORDER BY NAME
ROOT.GetSysSceneList: select ID,NAME,GROUPNAME from same:SearchDistrictCommonSql:SchemaAppName YSH_SCENE_INFO WHERE USERID='_sys_' ORDER BY GROUPNAME,id
